content: रेखा [लिख्-अच् लस्य रः] {@--1@} A line, streak, मदरेखा, दानरेखा, रागरेखा &c. {@--2@} The measure of a line, a small por tion, as much as a line; न रेखामात्रमपि व्यतीयुः <ls>R. 1. 17.</ls> {@--3@} A row, range, line, series. {@--4@} Delineation, sketch, drawing; लावण्यं रेखया किंचिदन्वितं <ls>Ś. 6. 13.</ls> {@--5@} The first or prime meridian of the Indian astronomers drawn from Laṅkā to Meru and passing through Ujjayinī. {@--6@} Fulness, satisfaction. {@--7@} Deceit, fraud.
